text: Once upon a time, a poet wrote a beautiful love song. And he made many copies, and sent them to his friends and acquaintances, men and women, and also to a young woman whom he had only seen once, and who lived beyond the mountains. And after two or three days a messenger came from the young woman, bringing a letter. And the letter said, "Let me tell you that I am deeply moved by the love song you wrote for me. Come early and talk to my parents about wedding preparations. And the poet answered, saying in his letter, 'My friend, the song that I sent you was nothing but a love song that sprang from the heart of a poet, sung by every man and every woman.' And she wrote to him in turn, saying, 'You hypocrite and liar! From this day until the day I am buried, I will hate all poets for their sake!
title: Canción de amor
author: Gibrán Jalil Gibrán
